name: The Ski Channel
tag_list: ski, snowboard, mountain, resort, ski-resort, television
overview:
The Ski Channel is a mountain sports television network and multi-media platform. It is also a large producer of mountain sports content including: films, television shows, interstitials, commercials and a significant amount of editorial. The television channel can be found in the ‘On Demand’ section in approximately 45 million US television households on major television carries including: Comcast, Time Warner Cable, DIRECTV, Charter, Cablevision, Cox, AT&T U-Verse, Verizon FiOS, Dish Network, Brighthouse, RCN, Filmon.com and numerous other television distributors. The channel is free to the consumer and features best in class ski, snowboard, climbing, riding and mountain sports content.

TheSkiChannel.com is the ski, snowboard and mountain industries’ most up-to-date source of news and information. Ski Channel Touch Ski 3D is the channel iPhone/iPad application that is now been downloaded by over 1,000,000 people. The Ski Channel Resort Rater application is the most sophisticated vehicle for making travel decisions in the industry. The channel also functions as a production company for blue chip and fortune 500 companies wanting to use the mountains as a marketing tool. The Ski Channel was founded by Steve Bellamy, also the founder of The Tennis Channel.
